con:part.con:content: {"swagger":"2.0","info":{"description":"This is a simple API","version":"1.0.0","title":"Simple Inventory API","contact":{"email":"you@your-company.com"},"license":{"name":"Apache 2.0","url":"http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html"}},"tags":[{"name":"admins","description":"Secured Admin-only calls"},{"name":"developers","description":"Operations available to regular developers"}],"schemes":["https"],"paths":{"/books":{"get":{"tags":["developers"],"summary":"Returns Goodreads books available at PCPL","operationId":"books","description":"Returns Goodreads books available at PCPL","produces":["application/json"],"parameters":[{"name":"branch","in":"query","description":"Specify the PCPL branch being searched","required":true,"type":"string"},{"name":"bookshelf","in":"query","description":"Specify the Goodreads branch to pull books from","required":true,"type":"string"}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"search results matching criteria","schema":{"type":"array","items":{"$ref":"#/definitions/InventoryItem"}}},"400":{"description":"bad input parameter"}}}}},"definitions":{"InventoryItem":{"type":"object","required":["id","name","manufacturer","releaseDate"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"d290f1ee-6c54-4b01-90e6-d701748f0851"},"name":{"type":"string","example":"Widget Adapter"},"releaseDate":{"type":"string","format":"int32","example":"2016-08-29T09:12:33.001Z"},"manufacturer":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Manufacturer"}}},"Manufacturer":{"required":["name"],"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","example":"ACME Corporation"},"homePage":{"type":"string","format":"url","example":"https://www.acme-corp.com"},"phone":{"type":"string","example":"408-867-5309"}}}},"host":"virtserver.swaggerhub.com","basePath":"/bbendick/gr-pcpl/1.0.0"}
